analysis.description:
OraclizeLib.oraclize_query (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#164-172) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- self.oraclize.query.value(price)(timestamp,datasource,arg) (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#171-172)

OraclizeLib.oraclize_query (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#176-184) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- self.oraclize.query_withGasLimit.value(price)(timestamp,datasource,arg,gaslimit) (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#183-184)

OraclizeLib.oraclize_query (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#188-196) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- self.oraclize.query2.value(price)(timestamp,datasource,arg1,arg2) (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#195-196)

OraclizeLib.oraclize_query (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#200-211) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- self.oraclize.query2_withGasLimit.value(price)(timestamp,datasource,arg1,arg2,gaslimit) (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#207-211)

Raffle.transferJackpot (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#1015-1029) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- sendSuccessful = winner.send(jackpot) (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#1026-1027)

Reentrancy in Raffle.chooseWinner (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#961-969):
	External calls:
	- executeRandomQuery() (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#968)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- randomQueried (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#968-969)

Reentrancy in ProgressiveRaffle.winnerSelected (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#1153-1168):
	External calls:
	- approveTokenTransfers() (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#1166)
	External calls sending eth:
	- transferJackpot(winner.purchaser,jackpotTotals.winnerTotal) (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#1161-1164)
	- transferCascades(jackpotTotals.absoluteTotal) (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#1164-1166)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- gameId (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#1167)
	- ticketHolders (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#1167)
OraclizeLib.getCodeSize (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#468-472) is declared view but contains assembly code
OraclizeLib.copyBytes (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#563-598) is declared view but contains assembly code

RewardApprover.approveTokenTransfers (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#638-643) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.approve(rewardDistributor,balance) (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#643)

Raffle.executeRandomQuery (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#951-959) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-oraclizeData.oraclize_newRandomDSQuery(0,randomBytes,callbackGas) (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#953-954)
	-oraclizeData.oraclize_query(URL,json(https://qrng.anu.edu.au/API/jsonI.php?length=1&type=hex16&size=32).data[0],callbackGas) (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#955-959)

ProgressiveRaffle.forceRefund has external calls inside a loop:
	- assert(bool)(token.transfer(holder.purchaser,uint256(holder.count).mul(tokenTicketPrice).mul(10 ** uint256(token.decimals())))) (/unique_chucks/16/0xbaca9c2faf03898fc5197ee90efb6e13df7f1d55.sol#1194-1197)
